overview: The film tells the story of the demon ancestor who has grievances in the world is about to appear. In order to defeat him and save people, Dongfang Mo (Lin Yu decoration), Ting Ting (Yi Zhengfu decoration) and merit master (nine hole decoration) are looking for The incarnation of the god monkey-Sun Xiaotian (Xie Miao).
title: Wukong's Diary
